title: TVS Motor exports over 1 million two-wheelers for the first time in a year in FY22
description: These include exports from TVS Motor Company and PT TVS, Indonesia. “The one million export mark is a significant milestone for TVS Motor Company. This further underscores our path towards being a global player in personal mobility solutions,” Sudarshan Venu, the Joint Managing Director of TVS Motor said in a statement.
